16. Have you determined the completion criteria for this step?

steps.stepLabel: Step Ten, Organizational Impact and Training

questions.question: 1. Is someone assigned to ensure this step in completed?

11. Will this project require on-the-job training to be delivered?

13. Are there any organizational issues that may impact this project's success
14. Are there any potential unintended consequences or impacts?
15. Do we know who will be impacted by this project?
16. Have you determined the completion criteria for this step?
17. Has this step been completed?
